text: The following is the list of political parties in Malaysia. * Barisan Nasional The National Front (BN) ** UMNO ** MCA ** MIC ** PBRS ** PCM ** KIMMA ** MPP ** MSMP ** Mira ** ppp ** pbm ** mcc \---- * Pakatan Harapan The Alliance of Hope (PH) ** Parti Keadilan Rakyat The People's Justice Party (PKR) ** Parti Tindakan Demokratik The Democratic Action Party (DAP) ** Parti Amanah Negara The National Trust Party (AMANAH) ** Pertubuhan Kinabalu Progresif Bersatu The United Progressive Kinabalu Organisation (UPKO) \---- * Perikatan Nasional The National Alliance (PN) ** Parti Pribumi Bersatu Malaysia Malaysian United Indigenous Party (PPBM / BERSATU / MUIP) ** Parti Islam Se-Malaysia The Malaysian Islamic Party (PAS / MIP) ** Parti Gerakan Rakyat Malaysia Malaysian People's Movement Party (GERAKAN / PGRM / MPMP) ** Parti Rakyat India Malaysia The Malaysian Indian People's Party (PRIM / MIPP) \---- * Gerakan Tanah Air The Homeland Movement (GTA) ** (PUTRA) ** (BERJASA) ** (M \---- * Gabungan Bersama Rakyat Bersatu Malaysia '''' ** (MUDA) ** Parti Sosialis Malaysia Socialist Party of Malaysia (PSM) \---- * Gabungan Parti Sarawak Sarawak Parties Alliance (GPS) ** PPBB ** SUPP ** PDP ** PRS \---- * Perikanan Rakyat Bersatu Sarawak Sarawak United p Alliance (perkasa) ** p ** PKS \---- * Gabungan Rakyat Sabah ** ** ** ** ** ** ** ** PCS ** KDM ** \---- * Parti Warisan Heritage Party (WARISAN) * Parti Solidariti Tanah Airku Homeland Solidarity Party (STAR) political party Malaysia
title: List of political parties in Malaysia
